SUBSCRIPTION_ADDED.title: Subscription purchase successful
SUBSCRIPTION_ADDED.description: You've successfully purchased a subscription for {{ term }} {term, plural, =1 {day} =2 {days} =3 {days} =4 {days} other {days}}

SUBSCRIPTION_UPDATED.title: Subscription renewal successful
SUBSCRIPTION_UPDATED.description: You've successfully renewed a subscription for {{ term }} {term, plural, =1 {day} =2 {days} =3 {days} =4 {days} other {days}}

SUBSCRIPTION_ENDING_SOON.title: Your subscription is ending soon
SUBSCRIPTION_ENDING_SOON.description: We're sorry, but your subscription will expire in just {{daysToExpire}} {daysToExpire, plural, =1 {day} =2 {days} =3 {days} =4 {days} other {days}}... We'll miss you!

BALANCE_ADDED.title: Replenish balance
BALANCE_ADDED.description: Your account was replenished for {{ amount }} USDT

TELEGRAM_INVITED.title: Invite to
TELEGRAM_INVITED.description: Your invite to Telegram. Good luck in that hell!

TELEGRAM_INVITED_1.title: Invite to Telegram chat
TELEGRAM_INVITED_1.description: Your invite to Telegram chat. Good luck in that hell!

TELEGRAM_INVITED_2.title: Invite to Telegram channel
TELEGRAM_INVITED_2.description: Your invite to Telegram channel LUCK. Good luck!

PAYMENT_ORDER_SUCCESS.title: Balance replenishment
PAYMENT_ORDER_SUCCESS.description: Order to replenish your balance was executed.

PAYMENT_ORDER_FAILED.title: Balance replenishment
PAYMENT_ORDER_FAILED.description: Order to replenish your balance has failed!

PAYMENT_TXID_EXIST.title: Balance replenishment
PAYMENT_TXID_EXIST.description: Your transaction number is already used by another user!

PAYMENT_FAILED.title: Balance replenishment
PAYMENT_FAILED.description: Failed to create order to replenish your balance, please contact Administration!

validation_messages.img: JPG or PNG, not more than 3MB

system-notification-dialog.update_ready: Update is ready {{ version }}. Want to update?
system-notification-dialog.update_failed: During installation of update {{ version }} an error has occured
system-notification-dialog.network_offline: Connection has been lost, page reload required

cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your user experience, app usage analytics and enable chat support.
cookies.analytic_cookies_description: Enabling these cookies will allow us to track your interaction with our site and make improvements.
cookies.support_chat_description: If you would like to have access to the support chat, these cookies are required.
